text: Professor Jones had worked on time theory for many years. "And I found the key equation", he said one day to his daughter. Time is a field. The machine I've made can manipulate, and even reverse, that field. Pressing a button while he was talking, he said, "This will set back time the backing will do this", he said, speaking while pressing a button. - Well, even investing and manipulating can manufacture that machine. Field one is time. "Daughter's a good day", he said. Key equation I found. Many years ago the time of the theory in which he worked was Jones Professor the. End of the Nightmare in Time
title: El final
author: Fredric Brown
